title: Pixel 5 adaptive brightness
content:
Along with having the battery percentage bug I have an issue with the adaptive brightness 
This is my second pixel 5 and same issue so I'm guessing it's across the board .
I have reset both phones and restarted from scratch with no change .

Taking the phone from a really dark environment e.g pocket into bright environment e.g daylight or office lighting and the Auto brightness takes so long to react . Unlocking with fingerprint I cannot even see the screen because the brightness is on the lowest and it takes 5 or more seconds to start brightening.
I put next to a 4XL and ran a lux app on both and you can see how smoothly the 4XL reads the light change but the pixel 5 is really delayed and jumps up in aggressive increments .
Surely I'm not the only one experiencing this or id think I'm going mad .

Hope this can be addressed in the next update , along with the battery percentage bug .
It's making using this phone hard
